TextLibrary.Text: Your Majesty, it was too late for your Iceguard. Lord Bane had them already. I couldn't save them.
Your Majesty, it was too late for your Iceguard. Lord Bane had them already. I couldn't save them.
Your Majesty, it was too late for your Iceguard. Lord Bane had them already. I couldn't save them.
Your Majesty, it was too late for your Iceguard. Lord Bane had them already. I couldn't save them.

We are saddened to hear this. These are troubled times. But we wish to shine a little light on this dark day. We wish to name you an honorary member of the Iceguard, for assisting in the rescue attempt.

Thank you, your Majesty. I'm honored.
